arts.ttl: Championship roundup: Millwall end QPR’s unbeaten run while Saints still struggle at home
arts.sum: Azeez and Ivanovic give Millwall 2-1 win Oxford 1-0 Derby, Southampton 0-0 Swansea Millwall ended QPR’s unbeaten run as first-half goals from Femi Azeez and Mihailo Ivanovic earned them a 2-1 win at Loftus Road. Azeez put the Lions ahead after 36 minutes and QPR, who had not lost in six matches, faced an uphill task once Ivanovic doubled Millwall’s lead in first-half stoppage time. Rumarn Burrell pulled one back for the hosts in the 85th minute, but they were unable to find an equaliser. The Lions midfielder Massimo Luongo was carried off on a stretcher after 14 minutes. Luongo, who spent four years with QPR, fell awkwardly during a challenge and suffered what appeared to be a serious knee injury. This story will be updated Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Millwall continue promising run with win at in-form QPR
arts.sum: Millwall ended QPR's unbeaten run as first-half goals from Femi Azeez and Mihailo Ivanovic earned them a 2-1 win at Loftus Road.

arts.ttl: QPR confusion leads to Millwall opener!
arts.sum: Millwall take the lead against QPR courtesy of Femi Azeez.

arts.ttl: “Stunning”: David Prutton has say on QPR ahead of Millwall clash
arts.sum: QPR are back in Championship action this weekend following the international break with a home clash against London rivals Millwall. The post “Stunning”: David Prutton has say on QPR ahead of Millwall clash appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
